title: Tomb Raider Classics Android
description:
Tomb Raider I v1.0.27RC
Requirements: 4.0+
Overview: LARAâ€™S BACK FOR MORE CLASSIC ACTION!
Weâ€™re going back to where it all began for one of the most famous video games of all time. Thatâ€™s right, Tomb Raider I is now available for your Android device in all its ORIGINAL glory.

We've not messed about with it, so itâ€™s the full, unedited, unadulterated experience from the classic release at a super-low price. How better to find out if you've still got what it takes to beat a legendary game than by taking on the lost city of Atlantis and the pyramids of Egypt? Itâ€™s probably not for the faint of heart!
Key Features:- 
- Epic Exploration - Uncover the deepest, darkest mysteries of the lost city of Atlantis and unearth secrets to Laraâ€™s past. 
- Acrobatic Gunplay - Deftly leap around charging enemies while you unleash a hail of bullets from your trademark dual pistols.
- Combat Lethal Predators â€“ Defeat Atlantean centaurs to the terrifying T-Rex

- Full Chapters â€“ Includes two extra chapters that were included in the gameâ€™s 1998 release

Hungry for more classic action? Get Tomb Raider I today and re-live the epic adventure of Lara Croft in the palm of your hands.


Tomb Raider II v1.0.37RC
Requirements: 4.0+
Overview: The multi award winning classic action adventure game from the glorious days of the 90s is back again in Tomb Raider II for Android users this year! 


The unstoppable Lara Croft is back in Tomb Raider II. Join Lara in her quest for the Dagger of Xian, reputed to possess the power of the dragon. But beware, Lara is not the only one in search of the dagger! Warrior Monks and crazed cult members plot against you as you travel from the remote mountain peaks of Tibet, the canals of Venice and to the bottom of the sea.
Key Features:

â€¢Explore GRAND NEW LOCATIONS from Tibet, China to Venice, Italy! 
â€¢ARM YOURSELF with automatic pistols, grenade launcher, M16 rifle and more! 
â€¢Over 50 UNIQUE ACHIEVEMENTS to unlock!
â€¢KILL OR BE KILLED by deadly Warrior Monks, Yetis and more! 
â€¢Comes complete with â€œTHE GOLDEN MASKâ€ expansion!
â€¢Take CONTROL OF VEHICLES such as motorboats and quad bikes!

This app has no advertisements
